[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: clone_vecmap_table()] [Copy Trait] Can T1 without proper copy semantics cause shallow copy, creating shared references and breaking isolation? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: clone_vecmap_table()] [Reverse Iteration] Why iterate backwards (i-- pattern)? Can forward iteration order matter for certain data structures, causing incorrect behavior? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: clone_vecmap_table()] [Transaction Context] Can ctx parameter be malicious or expired, causing table::new() to fail or create table in wrong storage? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: mul_d() + div_d()] [Round-Trip Asymmetry] Does div_d(mul_d(x, y), y) != x due to rounding, enabling attacker to profit from asymmetric conversions? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: mul_d() + div_d()] [Order Dependency] Can changing operation order (mul then div vs div then mul) produce different results, enabling manipulation? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: to_decimals() + from_decimals()] [Identity Failure] Does from_decimals(to_decimals(x)) != x for certain values, causing loss in repeated conversions? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: mul_with_oracle_price() + div_with_oracle_price()] [Price Asymmetry] Can div_with_oracle_price(mul_with_oracle_price(amount, price), price) != amount, enabling value extraction? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: to_oracle_price_decimals() + from_oracle_price_decimals()] [Conversion Loss] Does round-trip conversion lose precision, causing oracle price staleness to go undetected? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Constants: DECIMALS] [Hardcoded Value] Can DECIMALS=1e9 be insufficient for high-precision assets, causing significant rounding errors in vault accounting? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Constants: ORACLE_DECIMALS] [Precision Mismatch] Can 1e18 oracle decimals vs 1e9 vault decimals cause 1e9 factor errors when converting between systems? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Constants: DECIMALS] [Immutability] Although const, can any upgrade path change DECIMALS, breaking all existing share calculations? (Low)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Constants: Multiple Decimals] [Mixed Precision] Can code incorrectly use DECIMALS when ORACLE_DECIMALS is needed, causing 1e9x valuation errors? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Module: vault_utils] [Public Functions] Are all math functions public without access control, allowing attacker to call them with malicious parameters in custom contracts? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: parse_key()] [Asset Tracking] Can vault adaptors call parse_key() inconsistently, causing same asset to be stored under multiple keys and breaking borrow/return balance? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: mul_d()] [Share Calculation] When vault calculates shares=mul_d(amount, share_price), can rounding benefit attacker depositing/withdrawing repeatedly? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: div_d()] [Withdrawal Amount] When vault calculates amount=div_d(shares, share_price), can rounding cause withdrawn amount < expected, with difference stuck in vault? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: mul_with_oracle_price()] [Loss Tolerance] Can rounding in USD value calculation cause vault to accept losses > loss_tolerance by exploiting truncation? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: div_with_oracle_price()] [Health Factor] Can imprecise balance calculation from USD value cause health limiter to incorrectly approve unsafe operations? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: mul_d() + div_d()] [Fee Calculation] Can vault fee calculations using mul_d(amount, fee_bps)/10000 be exploited for under-payment through rounding? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: to_decimals()] [Minimum Amounts] Can converting minimum stake amounts to decimals overflow or round incorrectly, bypassing minimum requirements? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: from_decimals()] [Maximum Caps] Can converting fee caps from decimals truncate, allowing higher fees than intended? (High)

[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: clone_vecmap_table()] [Config Migration] Can cloning oracle config VecMap fail mid-operation, leaving vault in inconsistent state with partial config? (High)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: mul_d()] [Zero Input] Can mul_d(0, x) or mul_d(x, 0) be used to bypass minimum deposit checks by calculating zero shares? (Medium)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: div_d()] [Max Input] Can div_d(2^256-1, 1) overflow when multiplying by DECIMALS before division? (Critical)
[File: volo-vault/sources/utils.move] [Function: mul_with_oracle_price()] [Price Zero] Can mul_with_oracle_price(balance, 0) be used to report zero vault value, triggering emergency shutdown? (High)
